chapters.title: Chapter 17:  A Bronze Bear
chapters.info:
Keraille Surtovni,
      p. 374â€”One
      of the Kin.  She was in charge of a woman on an a'dam in
      the Palace in Caemlyn, along with Solain.  She has

      behind to watch Ellorien and company.
